    • isMapExists

      public boolean isMapExists(String p_mapName)
      Checks if the map with argument name exists or not. If it exists, it also checks if its valid or not.
      Parameters:
      p_mapName - Name of the map file to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if file exists and is a valid file, otherwise false.
